Text: Magnifico!  Seriously, this is a great rip.  Thank you very much, DH!

Thank you Deephole for this episode. And thank you trialNerror for your awesome uploads.

I enjoyed Season 4 of GA, here is hoping Season 5 will be even better. Thanks a lot to everyone who uploaded all the paranormal shows this year. I appreciate all your work, especially trialNerror who has done a amazing job on Ghost Adventures and Ghost Lab uploads.

Keep up the fantastic work!
